title: PlanBlueprint
description: Describes how to create instances of Plan (AI routine to undertake a given IAction under a given set of Condition)

Name.description: Human readable description of the plan

Identifier.description: Unique identifier for the plan for referencing in scripts

Condition.description: Conditions which all must be met for the Plan to be considered viable

Do.description: Describes the action and targets that should be picked in order to carry out the Plan

Weight.description: How popular the plan is relative to other plans

ConditionBlueprint.description: Blueprint that describes how to build one or more ICondition

Lua.description: Lua code that returns true or false

Has.description: Pass a Guid or Name of something they might have, if they have it then the condition is met

HasNot.description: Pass a Guid or Name of something.  As long as they don't have it this condition is true

Stat.description: Arithmetic expression for a required stat they must have e.g. "Fight > 50"

FrameSourceBlueprint.description: Describes how to create an IFrameSource

Lua.description: Lua code to construct a new Frame.  This is the action that should be performed if the plan is selected by the AI.  A Frame includes both the action and the selected targets
